parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty ambient light sensor can cause the headlights to switch between daytime running lights and headlights/taillights, leading to distractions and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Headlights flicker or switch between modes unnecessarily
especially in direct sunlight.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Instrument Panel and Infotainment System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument panel and infotainment system can lead to a loss of critical vehicle information, safety feature malfunctions, and driver distractions.
symptoms: Instrument panel goes blank
infotainment screen freezes or lags
rearview camera turns on unnecessarily
and radio fails to turn off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Intermittent window failures can cause inconvenience and potential safety risks, especially if the window becomes stuck in a certain position.
symptoms: Windows fail to roll down or up intermittently
with no warning lights or indicators.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Remote Start and Infotainment System Hacking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unauthorized remote start and infotainment system hacking can lead to safety risks, such as unexpected vehicle starts or distractions while driving.
symptoms: Vehicle starts remotely without authorization
infotainment system malfunctions or is hacked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunctions of headlights and safety features, such as forward collision warning and lane assist, can increase the risk of accidents and reduce vehicle safety.
symptoms: Headlights flicker or malfunction
forward collision warning and lane assist systems fail to operate
and backup camera displays a distorted image.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of doors and windows can cause safety issues, such as being unable to exit the vehicle in an emergency or being trapped inside.
symptoms: The driver door does not open
the window does not open
the door or window becomes stuck.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wireless Android system can lead to distracted driving, which can cause accidents and fatalities.
symptoms: The wireless Android system does not work
the system is unable to connect to devices wirelessly
the system only connects to devices through Bluetooth.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle catching on fire can cause serious injury or death, as well as property damage.
symptoms: The vehicle catches on fire while parked and turned off
the alarm system goes off
the vehicle is a total loss.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The automatic engine shut-off feature can cause safety issues, such as leaving pets or vulnerable individuals unattended in the vehicle without air conditioning or heat.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts off automatically after 15 minutes
the feature cannot be disabled
the owner is not notified before the shut-off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or even catch fire, putting the driver and passengers at risk of accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Loud noise from the engine
sudden loss of power
engine light illumination
low oil pressure warning
smoke emanating from the engine compartment
and in some cases
a muffled boom sound.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning auto headlight sensor can cause the headlights to flash constantly or turn on and off unnecessarily, leading to distractions, potential road rage, and safety issues due to the incorrect operation of the headlights.
symptoms: The headlights flash constantly or turn on and off unnecessarily during daytime driving
especially in partly cloudy
cloudy
or sunny conditions; the headlights may stay on in sunny conditions or turn off in shaded areas; the Daytime Running Lights (DRL) may flicker on and off.
